metadata.feature_description: Test interactive UI elements including inline editing, animations, and real-time validation.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Click row to expand inline edit form

steps.action: Clicked on first row in Influence goals table
steps.expected: Inline edit form should expand below the row
steps.actual: Inline edit form expanded with Goal Type dropdown, Weight, Value, Min Value, Max Value fields, and Cancel/Save buttons

steps.action: Clicked Cancel button to collapse inline edit form
steps.expected: Form should slide up and collapse
steps.actual: Form collapsed smoothly, table returned to normal state

steps.action: Opened inline edit form and clicked Save button
steps.expected: Toast notification should appear with success message
steps.actual: Toast notification appeared with 'Item successfully saved.' message and Success icon

steps.action: Opened inline edit form, cleared Weight field (required), and clicked Save
steps.expected: Validation error message should appear next to the invalid field
steps.actual: Validation error 'Text is required' appeared as a tooltip above the empty Weight field, with red error indicator visible

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify confirmation dialog for delete operations

steps.action: Clicked Remove button on a row with delete capability
steps.expected: Confirmation dialog should appear asking for confirmation
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared with warning icon, 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?' message, and Cancel/Delete buttons

steps.action: Clicked Cancel to dismiss the dialog
steps.expected: Dialog should close without deleting the item
steps.actual: Dialog closed and item remained in the list

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test responsive layout on different screen sizes

steps.expected: Layout should adapt to smaller screen
steps.actual: Layout adapted - PersonaBar icons visible, table content displayed correctly with some columns truncated

steps.expected: Layout should adapt to mobile screen
steps.actual: Layout adapted - PersonaBar collapsed to icons only, table simplified to show only Goal Type column, text truncated for long descriptions

steps.action: Scrolled to Miscellaneous Community Settings section and clicked Save button
steps.expected: Settings should save and toast notification should appear
steps.actual: Settings saved successfully with 'Item successfully saved.' toast notification

observations: The Community Settings UI does not have separate 'Settings' and 'Influence' tabs as originally suggested - both sections (Influence table and Miscellaneous Community Settings) appear on the same view
The 'Save' button text change to 'Saving...' could not be captured as the save operation completes very quickly
Keyboard navigation and accessibility testing was not performed as it requires more specialized testing approaches
